message.original: 弓の移動射ちの際、矢が照準からぶれなくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にぶれ幅がさらに軽減</COL>

message.translation: Decreases damage received from Fire attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に回復魔法を受けたとき 体力回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復速度がより上昇</COL>

盾弾きの発動時に敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the Knockout Power of perfect blocks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Knockout Power further.</COL>

message.translation: Decreases the Stamina consumed when you block attacks with your shield. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
